description: Rehabilition to provide two 6 bedroom maisonettes  two 4 bedroom maisonettes  one 3 bedroom maisonette  seven 3 bedroom flats  twelve 2 bedroom flats and nineteen 1 bedroom flats with landscaping  installation of pitched roofs and associated alterations.
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 41(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1971.
